title: What's new in version 3.0.1
text: We've resolved a glitch affecting the 'Restore Purchases' and 'Purchase' buttons that emerged in version 3.0.0. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused!

title: What's new in version 3.0.0
text:
We're thrilled to announce the launch of Hashrate version 3.0, a groundbreaking update where we've reinvented the app from the ground up to bring you a more comprehensive and user-friendly mining tool. Here's what's new:

• Favorite Crypto Price Tracker: Keep an eye on any cryptocurrency's price directly in the app or through our new widgets.

• Wallet Tracking: You can now manually add your crypto wallets to track the total value of your investments seamlessly.

• New Calculator Modes: Introducing Converter and Compound Interest calculators to help you manage your earnings more effectively.

• Data Export and Import: Easily backup or sync your data across devices privately with our new data transfer features.

•Expanded Pool Support: We've added new pools including Kaspa pool, Vipor.net, and KaspaMiners, and enhanced support for existing pools with additional coin options.

• Interface Overhaul: Experience our completely redesigned interface, making navigation and functionality smoother than ever.

• Widget Compatibility Note: We apologize for any inconvenience, but due to these extensive updates, old widgets are not compatible with version 3.0. Please remove any previous widgets and replace them with the new ones to enjoy the full benefits of the update.

We've poured our hearts into making version 3.0 a tool that not only meets your mining needs but also respects your privacy and security. This comprehensive overhaul is our commitment to providing you with the best mining tool available, designed to empower you to maximize profitability without compromising on privacy or security.

Thank you for your continuous support and happy mining!
